summary: At least the ones that have bard class are. This mod also shuts them up. Enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
Hey, hey. Ive uploaded an actual skyrim mod!
This replaces the bard class, as in, anyone who has that class. to be a khajiit.
Because cats. This also shuts up the bards.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Like all my mods as of now, this was finished in one day. While this may or may not detract from your willing to get any of my mods, i just wanted to let you know. I am a novice modder, and i can't really put forth this knowledge to make actual mods that arent op, cheats, or joke mods. I hope you understand.
author: OblivionBeaver
